title: So... about that Ocean Week thing back in January
body: Wasn't Riot going to sink a big statue into the ocean or something? I seem to be the only one who actually remembers this even though it was only just this year.

replies.body: Yes, but you can't just get a giant statue made and throw it into the sea. getting it made would take a while, then you gotta get permission to get it dumped in the sea, then you gotta find someone to dump it into the sea.
That's where I picked up this sweet fizz avatar.
People remember, just like they remember the 1,000RP we got, never forget.
